title: MSDE revamps Model Skill Loan Scheme; raises loan limit to Rs 7.5 lakh
description: Under the revamped scheme, NBFCs, microfinance institutions and small finance banks will be eligible to provide loans credit guarantee scheme while courses which are not aligned to the National Skills Qualification Framework (NSQF) will also be eligible for loan, allowing aspiring candidates to undergo skills training for high-end fee based courses.
